headline: Ventas Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.48 Per Common Share
summary: CHICAGO, September 18, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.48 per common share. The dividend will be payable in cash on October 16, 2025, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on September 30, 2025.

headline: How Is Ventas' Stock Performance Compared to Other Real Estate Stocks?
summary: Ventas has lagged behind its industry peers over the past year, yet Wall Street analysts maintain a bullish outlook on the stock’s prospects.
